snippet.title: MobileCon 2013 (Fall CTIA)
snippet.description: CTIA shows off what's new in smartphones, accessories, and all things mobile.

snippet.title: iPad (fall 2012)
snippet.description: The latest iPad adds several tweaks and improvements to secure its position at the top of the tablet heap. It's better all around, but third-gen owners need not apply.

snippet.title: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron (PC)
snippet.description: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron offers some entertaining action, lots of explosions, and few surprises.

snippet.title: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron (Xbox 360)
snippet.description: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron offers some entertaining action, lots of explosions, and few surprises.

snippet.title: Transformers Fall of Cybertron (PlayStation 3)
snippet.description: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron offers some entertaining action, lots of explosions, and too many technical hiccups.

snippet.title: 2014 Infiniti Q60
snippet.description: The 2014 Infiniti Q60 is a solid sport-luxury choice with some very enjoyable performance, but its dated cabin tech, while still useful, pushes no boundaries.

snippet.title: iRobot Roomba 880
snippet.description: The Roomba 880 is the most well-rounded, capable bot we've encountered so far, but the $449 Neato Robotics XV Signature Pro still wins the pet hair performance test on all flooring surfaces.

snippet.title: Turn photos into reminders or links with Shoots & Leaves
snippet.description: This iPhone app helps keep your camera roll uncluttered by saving photos to the cloud and providing a link that you can then use for a reminder or in an email or text.

snippet.title: TiVo Roamio Pro
snippet.description: If you're willing to pay the premium price, TiVo's do-it-all Roamio is the best cable DVR yet and an able whole-home TV solution.

snippet.title: Honeywell Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat with Voice Control
snippet.description: The voice control options are extremely basic, and the price increase just doesn't match the value added. Save some cash and get the $249 model or a Nest.
